*[[Item Magnet#Shops|Shops]] *[[Item Magnet#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Dowsing Machine''' is a type of battle item. It temporarily increases the player's chance of gaining extra items for 30 seconds and gives a +50% chance of getting an item from Pokémon that drop [[Rare Hold Items]]. == Details == ===Chance of Gaining More Items=== The Dowsing Machine gives a chance of gaining extra items from [[Dungeons|Dungeon]] chests. The specific chance depends on the item's Tier and follows this formula: \colorbox{White}{$ \text{Activation Chance} = \frac{0.5}{\frac{4}{\text{Tier} + 1}} $} The Tier variable takes a value from 4 (Common) to 0 (Mythic). This translates to this table: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Tier !! Activation Chance |- | Common || 62.5% |- | Rare || 50% |- | Epic || 37.5% |- | Legendary || 25% |- | Mythic || 12.5% |} ===Increase in Yield of Items Gained=== The number of items one obtains if the Dowsing Machine activates depends on both the Tier of said loot-able item and the [[Regions|Region]] of the Dungeon the player is in. The Common Tier yields more items, while the Mythic Tier yields fewer. On the other hand, the higher the Region, the more items will be obtained. The formula is: \colorbox{White}{$ \text{Item Yield} = 1+\max\left(1,\operatorname{round}\left(\frac{\max\left(\text{Tier},2\right)}{8}\cdot\left(\text{Region}+1\right)\right)\right) $} The Tier variable works as it does the previous formula, and Region takes a value from 0 ([[Kanto]]) to the highest available Region, 6 ([[Alola]]). This translates to the following table: {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan=2|Tier !! colspan=7|Item Yield per Region |- ! Kanto !! Johto !! Hoenn !! Sinnoh !! Unova !! Kalos !!
